creditline: Gift of Kim and Gloria Anderson
description: baluster form, after Chinese bronze vase form; tall, thin handle; diamond woven design on body over tightly-woven framework
text: A pupil of Tanabe Chikuunsai I, Shounsai was one of the pioneers of Chinese-style basket making in Osaka during the late 19th and early 20th century.
title: Handled Flower Basket
